segments.text: I think the woman is in her own little world, polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water spilling all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a snapshot of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how innocent it all seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even with the water everywhere, it’s kind of charming.
segments.speaker: PAR
